languages.text: {n}Ответ вырвался из уст Кибеллы прежде, чем она успела его обдумать. Осознав это, она принялась нарочито бесстрастно затачивать взявшееся неизвестно откуда в руках небольшое лезвие.{/n}

{n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can give it any thought. Upon realising this, she produces a small blade seemingly out of nowhere, and begins to sharpen it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ответ вырвался из уст Кибеллы прежде, чем она успела его обдумать. Осознав это, она принялась нарочито бесстрастно затачивать взявшееся неизвестно откуда в руках небольшое лезвие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can give it any thought. Upon realising this, she produces a previously hidden small blade and starts sharpening it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

{n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can stop herself. Upon realizing this, she produces a small blade seemingly out of nowhere, and begins to sharpen it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La respuesta brota de los labios de Kibellah sin apenas haberla pensado. Al darse cuenta de ello, saca un cuchillo pequeño de alguna parte y se pone a afilarlo con marcada indiferencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can give it any thought. Upon realising this, she produces a small blade seemingly out of nowhere, and begins to sharpen it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La respuesta brota de los labios de Kibellah sin apenas haberla pensado. Al darse cuenta de ello, saca un cuchillo pequeño de alguna parte y se pone a afilarlo con marcada indiferencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その答えは、考えるより先にキベラの口から漏れていた。それに気づき、間所はどこからともなく小型の刃物を取り出し、淡々と研ぎ始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can give it any thought. Upon realising this, she produces a small blade seemingly out of nowhere, and begins to sharpen it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その答えは、考えるより先にキベラの口から漏れていた。それに気づき、間所はどこからともなく小型の刃物を取り出し、淡々と研ぎ始める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈还没来得及细想，答案便已脱口而出。当她意识到这一点时，她不知从哪里掏出一把小小的匕首，打磨了起来，脸上带着刻意的漫不经心。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can give it any thought. Upon realising this, she produces a small blade seemingly out of nowhere, and begins to sharpen it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈还没来得及细想，答案便已脱口而出。当她意识到这一点时，她不知从哪里掏出一把小小的匕首，打磨了起来，脸上带着刻意的漫不经心。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Antwort entfährt Kibellahs Lippen, noch bevor sie darüber nachdenken kann. Als sie das erkennt, holt sie scheinbar aus dem Nichts eine kleine Klinge hervor und beginnt mit betonter Lässigkeit, sie zu schärfen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can give it any thought. Upon realising this, she produces a small blade seemingly out of nowhere, and begins to sharpen it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Antwort entfährt Kibellahs Lippen, noch bevor sie darüber nachdenken kann. Als sie das erkennt, holt sie scheinbar aus dem Nichts eine kleine Klinge hervor und beginnt mit betonter Lässigkeit, sie zu schärfen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La réponse s'échappe des lèvres de Kibellah avant qu'elle ait le temps de réfléchir. Réalisant son erreur, elle sort une petite lame surgie de nulle part et se met à l'affûter avec une nonchalance étudiée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can give it any thought. Upon realising this, she produces a small blade seemingly out of nowhere, and begins to sharpen it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, daha düşünmeye fırsat bulamadan cevabı ağzından kaçırıyor. Bunu fark edince hiç beklemediğin bir yerden ufak bir bıçak çıkarıyor ve altını çizercesine bir soğukkanlılıkla bıçağı bilemeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer escapes Kibellah's lips before she can give it any thought. Upon realising this, she produces a small blade seemingly out of nowhere, and begins to sharpen it with pointed nonchalance.{/n}
